snippet.title: Toad On Fire | Video Game Trailer | HD Reupload
snippet.description:
Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1417020/Toad_On_Fire/ | Also Available on Itch.io: https://deltacode.itch.io/toad-on-fire | Download and Try the Free Demo: https://deltacode.itch.io/toad-on-fire#demo

Embark on an epic journey in 'Toad On Fire,' a top-down, retro-inspired action-adventure shooter. Take control of Smokey, a courageous toad armed with a flamethrower, as he battles the invading force of hostile frogs led by the tyrannical King Baxter. Dive into 30 levels of intense action, including puzzles, boss battles, and more, all across several intense environments

Unleash the power of your flamethrower, leveling up its fireballs as you progress. Charge into the fray with burst-fire or transform into a blazing toad-missile of destruction! Discover shields to block projectiles and grenades to wreak havoc on your enemies. Explore markets, chat with locals, and unlock secrets as you collect gems and items to build your arsenal.

Immerse yourself in the irony of defending your homeland while leaving a trail of burning trees, shattered boulders, and explosive mayhem. Are you ready to confront King Baxter and save your toadstool kingdom?

🔥 Watch the trailer now and join the fiery adventure!🔥
